Thanks LC.  I'm going to listen to your recordings tonight when I get home.=
  I'm intrigued by the box research and anxious to get started, but frustra=
ted that I'm not mechanically inclined.  I think you may be onto something =
with regard to people having individual roles to play, and you must feel so=
 inspired by the messages you've received.

Robin


  ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
  From: LC Duplatt<mailto:lcdupla@...> 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoog=
roups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> 
  Sent: Wednesday, January 30, 2=
008 6:37 AM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: EVP


  Robin,

  I uploaded some of m=
y recordings that indicate a bigger picture.

  Some of the messages say th=
ere are "many spirits here," spirit rescue 
  is "very important," etc. You=
 can go through them under LC's folder.

  Last Friday, I recorded with res=
pect to 2008, "psychic event" 
  and "universal shift." That would indicate=
 that there is a bigger 
  thing going down, in my opinion. However, I also=
 acknowledge that 
  people here may have different callings/messages/uses =
other than what 
  I am hearing. I am going to just follow where the path b=
efore me 
  leads and try to find my role in it.

  Personally, I think thi=
s needs to be in many people's hands. That's 
  an interest of mine, too. N=
ot sure yet how it will happen, but the 
  radio hacks are a nice start. 

=
  LC

  --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC%40yahoogroups.com>, "=
Robin Searcy Henson" 
  <MudPuddleFarm@...> wrote:
  >
  > I haven't starte=
d box recording yet. My impression of the EVP I've 
  captured (which has b=
een almost entirely obtained on the property I 
  moved to six years ago) i=
s that someone is attached to this place. 
  The first message was "Here co=
me some people," as I was hiking up the 
  hill one day with my goats, then=
 a kill-you threat in the house, 
  then "get out of here" in the barn. I a=
ssumed it must be one of the 
  original owners, and I still feel that it's=
 mainly one spirit 
  communicating that this is their home, not mine. I've=
 gotten one 
  uplifting message from what I believe to be the same entity,=
 and this 
  is also the last recording I've gotten. I asked what death is =
like, 
  compared to life: happy, beautiful, fulfilling--and specifically i=
f 
  death is less depressing. The response was "It's everything." 
  S/he/=
it basically stopped talking after that, and I stopped trying. 
  I know th=
is sounds weird, but I miss whoever or whatever it was. I 
  wonder if some=
 of us might be better at dealing with the low-life 
  stuck or grounded en=
tities rather than the highly evolved technicians 
  coming through the mor=
e sophisticated equipment. I wonder where this 
  is all going ultimately, =
other than to prove communication across the 
  veil is possible. I'm not a=
n engineer or technologist on this 
  physical plane, and I question what I=
 have to offer this research 
  since I'm so electronically challenged. Mea=
nwhile, the nurse side of 
  me wants to heal and "fix" anyone needing help=
, even if they happen 
  to be in the next world! Do the guides and technic=
ians ever 
  acknowledge or make reference to the earthbound spirits, and i=
f so, 
  in what context? Are we ever able to help unstick the stuck ones? =

  Are we supposed to ignore them? 
  > 
  > Robin
  > 
  >

  communication 
  > from sp=
irits, (and less of the lower communication - ghosts 
  jumping 
  > in).
 =

  >

  > > > > historial pl=
ace (here in Illinois). The owner of this home 
  > asked if I
  > > > > wo=
uld bring one of the boxes to the home (he is amazed with 
  the
  > > > > =
immediately 2 way communication). So upon respectfully 
  asking 
  > my te=

  > > > > if it was alright to do a session outside the my home we 
  did=
 
  > several
  > > > > box sessions along with conventional EVP. We wanted=
 to see 
  if 
  > we could
  > > > > discover some unanswered history abou=

  the 
  > > > > otherside
  > > > > was more than wi=
lling to comply.
  > > > >
  > > > > I have to tell you that the regular EV=
P recordings were and 
  are 
  > the
  > > > > most boring data to review.=
 Something I use to love so much 
  has
  > > > > actually turned into a pr=
oject given I am waiting for a 
  response
  > > > > immediately! Too funny=
 how things can change overnight!
  > > > >
  > > > > I will be uploading s=
ome files for these sessions if you 
  are 
  > > > > interested.
